ValidationRule.description: Approver Name or Contact Email or Contact Name is Mandatory for Approval Task
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Approvals', OR(ISPICKVAL(Outcome__c ,'Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Outcome__c ,'Rejected'),ISPICKVAL(Outcome__c ,'Validate Task')), ISBLANK( WhoId ), ISBLANK( Approver_Name__c ), ISBLANK( ContactEmail__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide either Name or Contact Email or External Approver.
